attributes.action: give the citizens of our country the right to vote on issues such as immigration, european rules laws and legislation, wind farm and commercial expansion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the people of this country deserve the right to have a say in how it is run. general election votes are decreasing because each political party is as bad as the next. so why not give us the right to vote on anything that is going to infringe on each and every inhabitant in any way, be it laws, membership of international organisations or immegration.
